items.title: US Coast Guard actively pursuing another sanctioned vessel: Official
items.description: The Coast Guard also seized an oil tanker off the coast of Venezuela Saturday.

items.title: Efforts ongoing to restore power to San Francisco areas following outage
items.description: The majority of affected customers in San Francisco have had their power restored after outages that began Saturday, according to PG&E.

items.title: WATCH:  Middle school principal transforms into Elf on a Shelf
items.description: Principal Erica Cobb at Glenwood Middle School in Findlay, Ohio, transformed herself into an Elf on the Shelf to the delight of students.

items.title: Suspects sought after 9 killed in South Africa tavern mass shooting
items.description: A group of about a dozen assailants opened fire Sunday at a tavern in a South African township, police said.

items.title: WATCH:  Educator goes big with lessons involving a 43-foot whale
items.description: ABC News' Danny New explains why Jessica Woodend is travelling around her home state of Maine with a giant inflatable whale.
